description: Generate a 3D model of your GitHub contribution history. By default, it will create a {username}-{year}-github-skyline.stl file in the current directory. More information: https://github.com/github/gh-skyline.

useCases.description: Generate a skyline STL file for the current year and authenticated user:

Generate a skyline for a range of [y]ears:
Generate a [f]ull skyline (from the user's join year to the current year):
